articles.description: Wales reach Euro 2024 play-off final, Leicester are charged with breaching spending rules, plus build-up to international matches.
articles.title: Reaction as Wales win/lose and latest football news

articles.description: Williams driver Alex Albon interrupts first practice at the Australian Grand Prix with a heavy crash.
articles.title: Lando Norris tops Australian GP practice as Alex Albon crashes

articles.description: Manager Robert Page believes Wales are in a stronger position for Tuesday's Euro 2024 play-off final against Poland than when they qualified for the 2022 World Cup via the same route.
articles.title: Poland Euro play-off final won't faze Wales - Page

articles.description: Leicester City are charged by the Premier League with allegedly breaking spending rules during their last three seasons in the top flight.
articles.title: Leicester charged by Premier League with spending breach

articles.description: The former Brazil international was convicted in Italy for his part in a gang rape in 2013.
articles.title: Former Brazil international Robinho arrested to serve rape sentence

articles.description: Bukayo Saka withdraws from the England squad for the forthcoming friendlies against Brazil and Belgium.
articles.title: Saka withdraws from England squad for friendlies

articles.description: Wales are just one win away from Euro 2024 after beating Finland in their play-off semi-final at Cardiff City Stadium.
articles.title: Wales beat Finland to reach Euro play-off final

articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen manager Xabi Alonso is wanted by Liverpool and Bayern Munich, says the latter's honorary president Uli Hoeness.
articles.title: Bayern and Liverpool 'working on Alonso deal'

articles.description: Harry Maguire thanks England boss Gareth Southgate for his support, saying there are "loads of people who probably don't think I should be in the squad".
articles.title: Maguire thanks Southgate for support amid fan criticism

articles.description: Britain's Katie Boulter wins her opening match in Miami after teenage opponent Brenda Fruhvirtova retires through illness.
articles.title: Miami Open: Katie Boulter beats Brenda Fruhvirtova, Dan Evans also through
